WorkItem.ClosedComment: Added. For clipboard copy I also added cycle composition to see what the cycle looks like under the cooldowns (for example different filler because of more haste), but it's too big to fit in the tooltip.
WorkItem.Description:
When I use the 'copy character stats to clipboard', spell cycles and sequence are not included. It would be very useful to have this information if possible.
Â 
Furthermore, I'd like to request that total mana cost and total damage dealt by each spell cycle be included in the data. I can see Dps/Mps/Tps of individual spells/rotations when I mouseover those in the stats, but it would be nice to see the changes in damage and mana consumption those spells have when combining with abilities, trinket and consumables.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] spell cycles not copied to clipboard

Comments.Message: Good idea, I'll try to get it in for b14.
